channel.title: Increasing your maximum hit!
channel.description:
Hey!
I'm a new RSPS coder and I've been using this forum for a lot of my needs and find that there are some very useful people as well threads on here. My latest inquiry is how to increase your maximum hit. I know it seems awful but I'd think that as owner of you're server you would be able to 1 hit people in the wilderness with various weapons. I was wondering how can I either increase my maximum hit or increase the strength of a weapon so high that it auto 1 hits. Please and Thanks!

item.title: Increasing your maximum hit!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

If you have access to the server files you can edit an item’s strength bonus to lets say 10000, that should one hit anyone. Saying it’s server sided just means it can only be or is coded into the server files, not the client files.

Read full topic

item.title: Increasing your maximum hit!
item.dc:creator: @Ace10 Ace10
item.description:
@Ace10 wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

This is server sided.

Does that mean there’s no way to change it so that I can 1 hit people in wildly as well as other monsters?

Read full topic

item.title: Increasing your maximum hit!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

This is server sided.

Read full topic
